title: Senior Motion Control Systems Engineering Manager
summary: One of Apple’s R&D groups is currently seeking a senior motion control systems engineering manager. This engineering manager will lead a team to develop custom control algorithms, optimization routines and drive implementation for a host of systems and applications.  We are looking for passionate and creative individuals to push the performance bounds of control systems design. Does working on new technology excite you? Innovation is in your hands! We are ready to help you help us grow.
description: In this role you will partner with mechanical, power electronics and embedded FW engineers to develop robust and highly customized control algorithms for unique applications. Responsibilities include: Control system design, analysis, and integration Design, implementation and maintenance of an automated system for optimal system identification and control system tuning at scale. Prototype, develop, bring-up, debug and characterize new control techniques on real hardware. Define factory test & calibration requirements for complex systems  Author engineering requirements and specifications based on analysis and validation Communicate progress cross-functionally (written, verbal, and presentation) Perform failure analysis and problem solving
key_qualifications: Experienced in leading and managing a team of skilled engineers. Skilled in the development, theory, design, modeling and implementation of motion control algorithms. Experienced in control system state management (gain scheduling, bumpless transfers, state machine development). Experienced in state-space design, traditional controls methods (PID, observer/compensator) and modern control techniques such as MPC/LQR. Experience in both linear and non-linear estimation Hands on experience prototyping control algorithms and demonstrating capability at an executive level. Confident with source control (eg. GIT) on multi developer projects
education_experience: M.S. in Engineering + minimum of 10 years of industry experience
